description:
In this collection you can get your Fingers on the legendary IOTA Trading Cards promotion Card. This Card is not an official card of the Trading Card Game, but it scream out the motto of my Trading Card Game. 

From the community...
With the community...
For the community...
#IOTAstrong

The promotion Card is limited to the same limitation level than the Special Edition Cards are. There will be a max number of 91 Cards to get. All Cards of this SFT Collection costs only 1Mi, because it is for promotion only. 

But who knows... maybe that one will be the rarest card after the collectors ranking cards!?

TIME to open the Floodgates SOON!
name: IOTA Trading Cards Promotion sale
